title: Requires a sex offender to state whether he or she resides within 1/2 mile of any elementary or secondary school
summary: Requires a sex offender to state, on a verification form, the names of any school for children in grades pre-kindergarten through the twelfth which is located within a one-half mile radius of such offender's place of residence.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3187

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of A. CYMBROWITZ, WEISENBERG, GALEF, CASTRO, REILLY,
         GUNTHER, ABBATE, SCHROEDER -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of  A.  PHEFFER
         -- read once and referred to the Committee on Correction

       AN  ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the duty to register
         and to verify by a sex offender

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Paragraph  (b)  of  subdivision 2 of section 168-f of the
    2  correction law, as added by chapter 192 of the laws of 1995, is  amended
    3  to read as follows:
    4    (b)  The  verification  form  shall be signed by the sex offender, and
    5  state that he OR SHE still resides at the address last reported  to  the
    6  division.    SUCH  VERIFICATION  FORM SHALL REQUIRE SUCH SEX OFFENDER TO
    7  STATE THE NAME OF ANY SCHOOL FOR CHILDREN, REGARDLESS OF WHETHER  PUBLIC
    8  OR  PRIVATE, IN GRADES PRE-KINDERGARTEN THROUGH TWELFTH WHICH IS LOCATED
    9  WITHIN A ONE-HALF MILE RADIUS OF SUCH OFFENDER'S PLACE OF RESIDENCE.
   10    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
   11  it shall have become a law.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04447-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the duty to register and to verify by a sex offender
